attributes.action: To have a 4 day school week
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to do this because I believe it will improve mental health of the younger generation and increase attendance rates during the 4 day week, which would result in better GCSE results.
attributes.background: To reduce the school week to 4 days, either a Monday or Friday and have a 3 day weekend.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Reduce school to 4 days a week and have optional extra activities
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/756710
